title: Great Falls Park: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems       Great Falls Park is located in an area of change. The Potomac River drops 77 feet in less than a mile here on its journey to the Chesapeake Bay.  On these pages, you can learn more about the Potomac Gorge and the Falls.  The Potomac Gorge- a downloadable brochure with information on the ecosystems of the Gorge. Side 1 Side 2
